code: import React from'react';import'./CSS/Main.css';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";export function Title(params){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"title",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:params.title})});}export function SubTitle(params){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"subtitle",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:params.title})});}export function Video(props){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("iframe",{className:"videoFrame",src:URLtoEmbed(props.url),title:props.url,allowFullScreen:true});}function URLtoEmbed(url){var startIndex=url.search("v=");if(startIndex===-1)return"https://www.youtube-nocookie.com/embed/"+url;return"https://www.youtube-nocookie.com/embed/"+url.substring(startIndex+2);}
